channel.title: ferry on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ferry on Barefoot Rob

item.title: I'm on a boat
item.description: 14:34 Sunday 13 September 2015 JST We’re headed back to Tokyo from 式根島 (shikinejima) on a ferry that reminds me of Topaz in that it’s a boat with lots of passengers, all of whom are on a boat. Okay, a ship. I got a handkerchief branded with the island name for Lin, and a wooden puzzle for Fred. I went to the island for two days with the contact group, featuring four members, including the organizer, Mark.
